sentences.sContent: Table not allowed in footnote, endnote, header, footer, comment, or text box.
sentences.sContent_eng: Table not allowed in footnote, endnote, header, footer, comment, or text box.
sentences.sCn: 脚注、尾注、页眉、页脚、批注或文本框中不允许有目录。

sentences.sContent: I noticed that the author of our textbook frequently referred by footnote to these library books.
sentences.sContent_eng: I noticed that the author of our textbook frequently referred by footnote to these library books.
sentences.sCn: 我还注意到，从图书馆借来的这些书，恰是课本的著者经常在脚注中提到的。

sentences.sContent: Today, my foremost concern should be to research the folklore of my home country so that I can finish the footnote to my report.
sentences.sContent_eng: Today, my foremost concern should be to research the folklore of my home country so that I can finish the footnote to my report.
sentences.sCn: 今天，我最主要关心的应该是研究祖国的民间传说，那样我就可以完成我的报告的脚注了。

trans.tranOther: a note at the bottom of the page in a book, which gives more information about something
